snippet.title: Paper Beast: Folded Edition teaser trailer
snippet.description:
The unique VR adventure soon available for PC players without a VR headset on 20th October!

As the first explorer of this virgin land, overcome obstacles and environmental puzzles by supporting the efforts of creatures in their adventures!

Visit our website: https://www.pixelreef.fr/

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1403830

Follow us on:
Twitter: twitter.com/pixelreef
Facebook: facebook.com/PixelReefOfficial/
Instagram: instagram.com/pixelreef
